servers.name: Second server
servers.description: Example server with a very slow startup. The exposed descriptors are not loaded immediately.

servers.name: Third server
servers.description: Example server with a not so slow startup. The exposed descriptors are not loaded immediately.

descriptors.name: pubchem1k-cfp7
descriptors.description: 1k random structures from PubChem with CFP-7 fingerprints

descriptors.name: essentials-cfp7
descriptors.description: WHO Essential Medicines set with CFP-7 fingerprints.

servers.name: Fourth server
servers.description: This server is sometimes down. (The example contains a script which shuts down this server only.)

servers.name: Down server
servers.description: This server is NOT launched in the example; it is always down.

descriptors.name: xxxx-cfp7
descriptors.description: This server is always down; this descriptor will not be available
